cards.title: Project access anywhere
cards.description: Complete tasks effortlessly with a best-in-class mobile app built for the field.

cards.title: Help when you need it
cards.description: Your success is our top priority. Our expert support team is there for you 24hrs a day M-F.

cards.title: Safe and secure
cards.description: Your data is secure with us. Autodesk Construction Cloud has enterprise-grade security.

cards.title: Training that fits your schedule
cards.description: We know your time is precious. Learn Autodesk Construction Cloud with free, 5-minute videos.

cards.title: Money back guarantee
cards.description: We want you to be happy. We offer a no-hassle 30-day money-back guarantee.

cards.title: Expert services for success
cards.description: Need extra support? Our delivery service team is ready to help your business succeed.

body.title: Leverage the power of Autodesk Construction Cloud

accordionSections.sectionTitle: What's included in your Standard plan?
Can I change tiers during my subscription?

expandedContent.markdown: The subscription tier can be increased during the duration of a subscription, but not decreased until time of renewal.
Chrome, Firefox, Safari web browsers; Available on iOS and Android mobile and tablet devices through the Autodesk Construction Cloud mobile app.

Autodesk Build currently supports the following languages: English (US & UK), Dutch, French (including Canadian French), German, Japanese and Spanish. Language support includes text, date formatting and numbers.
